title: i cant play league without an external monitor...help
body: i used to play league on my laptop but one day i played it on a external monitor since then when i  m get pass the champion select the game crashes it crahses until i plug my external screen

replies.body: Switching to another screen shouldn't cause a crash to occur.  Are you using any third party programs like play.tv or overlays?  They can cause issues during champion select and result in a crash.  If that's the case for you, remove them.  Let me know if that helps.

Have you tried editing your game.cfg to set it to the right resolution?

if you don't know how to do that then look at this link: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Z1tQ2LZE-league-of-legends-caused-access-violation-in-module-league-of-legends-game-crashhelp?comment=0001

This fixed my problem with the external screen as well.
